Title: Train to Kandy
Writer: Udana Fonseka (screenplay), Yuresh Madhushan (screenplay), Paul Andrew Williams (original story)
Actors: Nadeesha Hemamali, Deshani Pathirana, Menaka Rajapakse, Kalana Gunasekara
Plot: A tough call girl and a teen runaway try to survive the night and escape from a diabolic thug who wants the girls captured under the suspicion of killing his father.
